verbose_text: Subsequent work has revealed that the relatively small effect on Akt activation of ablating binding of PDK1 to PtdIns (3,4,5) P 3 is probably due to a second mechanism that brings Akt and PDK1 together and that is mediated by PDK1 possessing a docking site that recognizes Akt after it is phosphorylated at Ser 473 by mTORC2 (mTOR complex 2) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: mediated by PDK1 possessing a docking
